title: Workspace Backend Configuration
description: Configuration schema for the workspace-backend CLI application

$schema.description: Reference to the JSON schema for validation and LSP completions

file.description: Optional path for log file output. Supports ~ and environment variables.

parallelism.description: Override the worker pool size. Defaults to logical CPU count when unset.

timeout.description: Timeout in seconds for long-running operations

paths.description: Custom directory paths for persistent data and state

data_dir.description: Directory for persistent data. Defaults to $XDG_DATA_HOME/workspace-backend or ~/.local/share/workspace-backend

state_dir.description: Directory for machine-specific state (logs, history, etc.). Defaults to $XDG_STATE_HOME/workspace-backend or ~/.local/state/workspace-backend

runtime.description: Container runtime type. Auto-detected if not specified.

binary.description: Custom path to the container runtime binary

base_port.description: Base port for allocating session ports. Each session uses 3 consecutive ports.

eavs.description: EAVS (LLM proxy) configuration. EAVS runs on host, not in containers.

enabled.description: Enable EAVS integration for session virtual keys

base_url.description: URL of the EAVS server (accessible from host)

container_url.description: URL for containers to reach EAVS (via Docker host networking). For Docker: http://host.docker.internal:41800, for Podman: http://host.containers.internal:41800

master_key.description: Master key for EAVS admin operations (create/revoke keys). IMPORTANT: Change this in production! Can also be set via EAVS_MASTER_KEY env var.

default_session_budget_usd.description: Default session budget limit in USD

default_session_rpm.description: Default session rate limit in requests per minute

dev_mode.description: Enable development mode (uses dev_users for authentication, relaxed security). Set to false for production deployments.

jwt_secret.description: JWT secret for signing tokens. REQUIRED when dev_mode = false. Must be at least 32 characters. Can be a literal value or reference an environment variable with env: prefix (e.g., env:AUTH_JWT_SECRET).

oidc_issuer.description: OIDC issuer URL for external auth providers

allowed_origins.description: CORS allowed origins. Defaults to localhost:3000 and localhost:8080 in dev mode.

dev_users.description: Development users (only used when dev_mode = true). These are created with bcrypt-hashed passwords at startup.

password_hash.description: Password hash (bcrypt). Use: htpasswd -nbBC 12 username password | cut -d: -f2
